ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67666?8" EMS Situation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10154?3" EMS complaint (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type ST
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67491?1" Complaint duration (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
Units SHALL be selected from UCUM time units (i.e., s, min, h, d, wk, mo, a)
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains at least one [1..*] observation
Such observations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such observations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD
Such entrys SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AnatomicLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.76 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.07 Complaint site is required if complaint is type "Chief complaint"
Such entrys SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
The organ system is required if the complaint is of type "Chief complaint"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69468?7" Organ system (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet OrganSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.77 STATIC
The organ system is required if the complaint is of type "Chief complaint"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type TS

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69467?9" Possible injury (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67774?0" EMS Primary Symptom (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="ADD ICD 10"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67493?7" Initial Patient Acuity (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.78 STATIC

Contains exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type TS

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67492?9" Provider Primary Impression (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="ADD ICD10 CM"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67776?5" Other symptoms (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD/@code="ADD ICD-10 CM"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69542-9" Provider Secondary Impressions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD/@code="ADD ICD 10 CM"
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
